attributes.action: RESTRICT THE NUMBER OF CARS AT PROPERTIES TO CUT GASES AND HELP THE ENVIRONMENT.
attributes.additional_details: WE THE UNDERSIGNED WOULD LIKE LAWS BROUGHT IN TO RESTRICT THE NUMBER OF CARS PER HOUSEHOLD, IT IS A WASTE OF FUEL AND CREATES A LOT MORE GREENHOUSE GASES, IT WOULD ALSO HELP TO CLEAN THE AIR, WITH MORE AND MORE CARS BEING ADDED TO OUR ROADS AND FUEL SOURCES REDUCING IT MAKES SENSE TO SAVE WHAT WE HAVE FOR THE FUTURE.
